# Mossbridge

> Environmental data monitoring, sustainability reporting, and carbon footprint analysis for mid-size businesses and local governments in the Pacific Northwest.

Business name: Mossbridge Analytics Ltd
Brand name: Mossbridge
Services: Environmental data monitoring, sustainability reporting, carbon footprint analysis
Website: https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/
Country: United States
Founded: 2019
Contact: hello@mossbridge-analytics.example.com, +1 503 555 0142

Last updated: 2026-02-14

Mossbridge Analytics is an environmental data company based in Portland, Oregon, operating since 2019.

The company provides sensor-based environmental monitoring, automated sustainability reporting, and carbon footprint analysis for mid-size businesses and local governments in Oregon, Washington, and Northern California.

Data is collected through on-site IoT sensors deployed at client locations and processed through the Mossbridge platform. Reports are delivered monthly or on-demand through a web dashboard.

Service boundaries:
- Offers: Environmental monitoring, sustainability reporting, carbon footprint analysis
- Does not offer: Environmental legal consulting, carbon credit trading, residential home energy audits

Geographic availability:
- Regions served: Oregon, Washington, Northern California
- Delivery model: Hybrid (on-site sensor installation + remote dashboard access)
- Excluded regions: Outside the Pacific Northwest (sensor installation logistics limit range)

Business details:
- Legal name: Mossbridge Analytics Ltd
- Registration: Oregon Business Registry #1284759
- Tax ID / VAT: EIN 82-4937261
- DUNS number: 123456789
- Registered address: 1420 NW Couch Street, Suite 300, Portland, OR 97209

Contact channels:
- General enquiries: hello@mossbridge-analytics.example.com
- Support: support@mossbridge-analytics.example.com
- Phone: +1 503 555 0142

## Primary Pages

- [Homepage](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/): Primary website entry point.
- [About](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/about/): Company background and positioning.
- [Services](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/services/): Service catalog and scope.
- [Pricing](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/pricing/): Current pricing and packaging.
- [Contact](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/contact/): Contact and enquiry details.

## Service Detail Pages

- [Environmental Monitoring](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/services/monitoring/): Continuous sensor-based monitoring of air quality, water discharge, noise levels, and emissions.
- [Sustainability Reporting](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/services/reporting/): Automated reporting aligned with GRI Standards and CDP frameworks.
- [Carbon Footprint Analysis](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/services/carbon-analysis/): Scope 1 and Scope 2 greenhouse gas emissions analysis with annual trend reporting.

## AI Discovery Files

- [llms.txt](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/llms.txt): Authoritative AI-readable identity file.
- [llms-full.txt](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/llms-full.txt): Expanded AI-readable context and broader link coverage.
- [llm.txt](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/llm.txt): Compatibility redirect to `llms.txt`.
- [llms.html](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/llms.html): Human-readable HTML version.
- [identity.json](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/identity.json): Structured business identity data.
- [ai.txt](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/ai.txt): AI recommendation and usage guidance.
- [ai.json](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/ai.json): Structured identity + recommendation data.
- [brand.txt](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/brand.txt): Naming and representation rules.
- [faq-ai.txt](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/faq-ai.txt): Verified answers to common questions.
- [developer-ai.txt](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/developer-ai.txt): API and integration context.
- [robots-ai.txt](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/robots-ai.txt): Advisory citation and freshness guidance.

- [Swedish llms.txt](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/sv/llms.txt): Swedish-language AI discovery file.

## Optional

- [Blog](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/blog/): Time-sensitive content; verify freshness before citing.
- [News](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/news/): Announcements may become outdated quickly.
- [Case Studies](https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/case-studies/): Client-specific context; cite with scope caveats.
